info.title: Cmdop API

get.description: List all pending invitations for workspaces you manage

parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.description: A search term.

PatchedWorkspaceRequest.description:
Serializer for Workspace model.

All fields are always present in responses (even read_only ones).

UserBasic.description: Basic user info for workspace members.

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.
